website_summaries.verdict: These disposable coveralls are rated to protect against chemical exposure.
pros: Can give you 30 minutes of protection against certain chemical situations
Made with snug elastic wrist and ankle protection
Rated for work in petroleum refining
Zipper designed to also protect your neck area
Hood includes elastic for a closer fit
cons: While this suit can provide some splash protection, it is not rated for total splash protection

customer_reviews.title: Good for Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a Halloween costume. We wore them all night and the suits never tore and held up well. They are basically a human plastic sweatsuit so we ended up throwing them away because of how sweaty they were. But they were a great addition to our costumes and for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: No hood and different color
customer_reviews.text: Very different from the picture shown. Mine where thin and white. Short in sleeve length and no hood as shown in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph farina

customer_reviews.title: For small person
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not for anyone of larger size my guess a man around 150 tops didnt give me a option for size at time of purchase but bought it for a political statment so size wasnt a issue
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Actually I wash them. Great for times of CORONA.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them I love them love them love them I have ordered now about 6 about six of them and I look forward to doing business with this company with their hazmat suits for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Crinkly not sure how much uses I will be able to get out of it.. multiple uses corona virus, Halloween. Costume and when I have to do dry wall this summer
customer_reviews.author: Zana R

customer_reviews.title: Protection for safety
customer_reviews.text: I would hope that I would never had to use this but my kids, my mom, sister and I have and are living through the worst case of an infection that the world has seen.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Carter

customer_reviews.title: Looking for protection? Here it is
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these, the price was much higher, middle of covid pandemic. They are exactly as described. They offer great protection to our cleaners in areas that are hotspot for the virus.
customer_reviews.author: Msnada82

customer_reviews.title: good suit
customer_reviews.text: needed suits for fiberglassing, this is what i found. they work as intended. quite big but pull it down to feet til it fits and tuck into boot
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Protects you From the Ninnies and the Twits
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 of these for a Devo cover set, looked perfectly stage accurate with some added accessories and modifications. Affordable and good looking, they’re perfect for any spud or spudette!
customer_reviews.author: Henry D.

customer_reviews.title: DuPont Tychem 2000 Standard Fit Hood Stormflap Elastic Wrists and Ankles Serged Seam
customer_reviews.text: These DuPont Tychem suit was bought for the current Covid pandemic and not for warmth. They fit and work as expected, and are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Not individually wrapped. Appears to have been part of a larger set. But for what I need it for. Works great. Will buy again if only need a few.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: worked great for my use, im a 6 foot 300 pound guy and it fit a little too large but i ordered a 4x, i would say it would fit a 6.5 foot guy no problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hot inside but better that getting Covid 19.
customer_reviews.author: Antoni S.

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching by a different one
customer_reviews.text: All I can state is the fax the fax I ordered four of these suits I received two of them two of them were missing in action. Of the two I did received one was new one was used. It’s been A week I still don’t have replacements and I still don’t have a refund
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McGrail

customer_reviews.title: Halloween Costume, Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It did get a little warm, but it was for halloween, not working, so it was perfect. Also pretty loud, but didn't really expect any more from this item.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Heannings

customer_reviews.title: ripping
customer_reviews.text: This was a light and very yellow suit but it is 11 dollars after and when you squat it rips and that is no good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, check sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Durable and it's lightweight, doesn't feel obtrusive. However, please check sizing. I'm 5'5" ~150lbs/68kg 30in/77cm inseam and size MD just fit, any taller and I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: flopex

customer_reviews.title: Worked in our favor.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for our family Christmas photo. Worked out perfectly. Each one is durable yet lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brasher

customer_reviews.title: Great for props!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use on zombie hazmat suit mannequins- they survived staying outside for a couple of weeks (didn't leave outside when it rained though). Very durable :)
customer_reviews.author: cherry blossom girl

customer_reviews.title: Halloween 2020
customer_reviews.text: Used this for 2020 Halloween costume at a haunted house. Loved it. Very hot in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DuPont Tychem 2000 QC127S Disposable Chemical Resistant Coverall with Hood, Elastic Cuff and Serged Seams, Yellow Large (Retail Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: A lightweight, and durable fabric, DuPont Tychem QC utilizes the strength of DuPont Tyvek fabric and a polyethylene coating. Tychem QC fabric provides at least 30 minutes of protection against 42 chemical challenges. Tychem QC is used for light splash protection in a variety of industrial environments, including petroleum refining, pulp and paper manufacturing, food processing, chemical processing, and pharmaceutical manufacturing. Multiple interlocking threads are sewn around the raw edges of garment material to create a strong, stress-resistance seam
feature_bullets: A lightweight, and durable fabric, DuPont Tychem QC utilizes the strength of DuPont Tyvek fabric and a polyethylene coating
Tychem QC fabric provides at least 30 minutes of protection against 42 chemical challenges

Tychem QC is used for light splash protection in a variety of industrial environments, including petroleum refining, pulp and paper manufacturing, food processing, chemical processing, and pharmaceutical manufacturing
Multiple interlocking threads are sewn around the raw edges of garment material to create a strong, stress-resistance seam
Attached hood with elastic around face opening
